alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 19 at 2:39PM CDT until April 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis and Southern Lake Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
